name: DECO VIANA
description:
This is a pretty purse that uses all Portuguese fabrics. The fabrics used are a hand embroidered white on blue cotton with motif from Viana do Castelo and a pretty flower pattern cotton. For the back of the purse I used a traditional blue and red check wool, typically used for fishermanÂ´s shirts and pants. Trademark red crocheted cotton leaf for a tail.

Measurements:
The purse measures 18cm across the frame, 23 cm across the bottom and is 13 cm tall.

All prices are in Euros.

You are welcome to visit my blog:
Esquilohandmade.blogspot.com

name: RED APRIL
description:
This purse is made from a traditional hand embroidered apron from Viana do Castelo and vintage fabrics I picked up from Australia a long time ago. Trademark blue crocheted cotton leaf for a tail.

Measurements:
The purse measures 18cm across the frame, 27 cm across at its widest and is 19 cm tall.

All prices are in Euros.

You are welcome to visit my blog:
Esquilohandmade.blogspot.com

name: ORANGE VIANA
description:
Fabrics used are a vibrant orange hand embroidered cotton apron from Viana do Castelo for the front and an african wax print fabric for the back. For the lining I used a vintage cotton also often used to make aprons. Trademark blue crocheted cotton leaf for a tail.

Measurements:
The purse measures 18cm across the frame, 26 cm across the bottom and is 18 cm tall.

All prices are in Euros.

You are welcome to visit my blog:
Esquilohandmade.blogspot.com

name: RED CHECK
description:
Fabrics used are hand embroidered cotton from Viana do Castelo for the front and a vintage wool fabric for the back. For the lining I used a vintage fabric which is black with small white flowers. This fabric is a loosely woven cotton known as "Chita". All fabrics used for this purse are Portuguese.Trademark green crocheted cotton leaf for a tail.

Measurements:
The purse measures 18cm across the frame, 26 cm across the bottom and is 18 cm tall.

All prices are in Euros.

You are welcome to visit my blog:
Esquilohandmade.blogspot.com

name: MOD and STRIPES
description:
A simple little MOD number made using all portuguese cottons and ribbons. Trademark blue crocheted cotton leaf for a tail.

Measurements:
